english.segment1: What Is Best For Me. You Take It So Seriously
english.segment2: Was November, When I First Fell. And Now I Fall A Lot. Was December, When I First Knew. But I Could Not Tell You
english.segment3: It's A Choice That I Made. A Mistakes What You Made It For Me. A Wall In My Way. But Never Is Too Long To Wait For Me
english.segment4: Wait And See. I'll Get It Right This Time. Trust In Me. I'll Get It Right This Time
english.segment5: You Never Know. If You Can't Let Go. It's Now Or Never. And Never Is Too Long To Wait For Me
